{{Description|After a period of adventures together, [[Paimon]] had a sudden idea to take a break by reading books. Hence, the two of you set out to the [[Knights of Favonius]]'s library, only to unexpectedly come across two friends...}}
'''Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 4.1]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2023/10/06 10:00 - 2023/10/16 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above
* Complete [[Archon Quest]] [[Prologue]]: Act III "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"
** Complete [[Klee]]'s [[Story Quest]] "[[Trifolium Chapter]]: Act I" first to get the best experience from this event.

===Summary===
* During the event, a new stage will unlock every day. Complete the challenges in all stages to obtain rewards such as [[Primogem]]s, [[Weapon Ascension Material]]s, [[Hero's Wit]], [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]], and [[Mora]].
* From the first day of the event, a new stage will unlock every day. A total of six stages will be unlocked.
* Defeat Spikey Fish using Special Jumpy Dumpties to obtain points. The amount of points scored will vary depending on the defeated Spikey Fish. Accrue specified points to obtain the corresponding rewards.
* Special Jumpy Dumpties of different colors have different explosion AoEs. Keep their unique traits in mind and throw them well for a higher score.

===Tutorial===
{{Tutorial
|image1   = Tutorial Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure 1.png
|text1    = Defeat the {{Color|help|Spikey Fish Warrior}} using special Jumpy Dumpty to obtain {{Color|help|1 point}}. Defeat the {{Color|help|Spikey Fish King}} to obtain {{Color|help|2 points}}.
|image2   = Tutorial Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure 2.png
|text2    = Special Jumpy Dumpties of different colors have {{Color|help|different explosion AoEs}}. Keep their unique traits in mind and throw them well for a higher score...
|image3   = Tutorial Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure 3.png
|text3    = After a Special Jumpy Dumpty is thrown, if it comes into contact with {{Color|help|Spikey Fish or objects}} along its path, it will {{Color|help|automatically explode}}.
|image4   = Tutorial Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure 4.png
|text4    = After throwing a Special Jumpy Dumpty, you can {{Color|help|press the Throw button again}} to cause it to explode immediately. You can use this method to make the most of the Jumpy Dumpties' explosion radii...
|image5   = Tutorial Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure 5.png
|text5    = Spikey Sneaky Seagrass and Spikey Stony Strongholds can withstand frontal blasts, but said {{Color|help|Seagrass will be obliterated after a single explosion}}...
|image6   = Tutorial Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure 6.png
|text6    = After Krash-Kaboom Mine is ignited, it can {{Color|help|trigger a second explosion with a massive AoE}}. However, these explosions can still be blocked by Spikey Sneaky Seagrass and Spikey Stony Strongholds...
|image7   = Tutorial Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure 7.png
|text7    = Some Spikey Sneaky Seagrass hides special Jumpy Dumpties. Destroying this Seagrass will {{Color|help|gain you the aid of additional special Jumpy Dumpties}}...
}}

==Stages==
===I===
{{Description|In the calm waters of the Cider Lake, Mondstadt's little fish were enjoying a life of peace and quite. Until one day, a legion of Spikey Fish Warriors came. These Spikey Fish Warriors had never been seen in the Cider Lake before. These rude fish drove the Mondstadt fish away from their home.<br>To defend their home and drive the rude invaders away, Mondstadt's little fish turned to the powerful and resourceful Dodoco to help them...}}

</gallery></div>

;Dodoco's Little Trick
Watch the positions of the Spikey Fish and choose the right special Jumpy Dumpty. After a special Jumpy Dumpty is thrown, find the right time to let it explode, which will make the most of the special Jumpy Dumpty and blow up the most Spikey Fish.

|Armored and wielding a tiny sword, the Spikey Fish Warrior is much stronger than regular fish in the Cider Lake, but it can do nothing but run for its life when confronted by the special Jumpy Dumpties!<br>Defeat the Spikey Fish Warrior to obtain {{color|BP|1 point}}.
|-
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Spikey Fish King.png|100px]]

===III===
{{Description|The Spikey Fish Warriors have learned to shield themselves in reefs and hide their traces in seagrass, resulting in a diabolical game of hide-and-seek! Yet, Dodoco must remain calm and patient, and needs to listen carefully underwater to find all those bad guys... For this reason, Dodoco has invited some very special allies: special Jumpy Dumpties with different abilities!}}

;Dodoco's Little Trick
After the previous battles, the Spark Knight, Dodoco, and the special Jumpy Dumpties already know the Spikey Fish well. Now is the time to show them what for! Defeat the invading Spikey Fish once and for all!

;Opposing Lineup
{|class="article-table"
!colspan="2"|Name
!Description
|-
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Spikey Fish Warrior.png|100px]]
|Spikey Fish Warrior
|Armored and wielding a tiny sword, the Spikey Fish Warrior is much stronger than regular fish in the Cider Lake, but it can do nothing but run for its life when confronted by the special Jumpy Dumpties!<br>Defeat the Spikey Fish Warrior to obtain {{color|BP|1 point}}.
|-
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Spikey Fish King.png|100px]]
|Spikey Fish King
|A Spikey Fish with a gorgeous golden appearance and a menacing image. It is said that Spikey Fish Warriors respectfully call them Kings! However, why are there many kings, just like there are many warriors? Perhaps this is more of a unique title in their tribe than a recognition give to the strongest. After all, "a school of kings are invading us!" sounds very, very scary and very, very imposing!<br>Defeat the Spikey Fish King to obtain {{color|BP|2 points}}.
|-
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Krash-Kaboom Mine.png|100px]]
|Krash-Kaboom Mine
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Krash-Kaboom Mine AoE.png|100px|right]]
Krash-Kaboom Mines are good partners who hide themselves near the Spikey Fish. Their bodies are huuuge! Spikey Fish cannot move these mines and have no idea what they are for, so they just leave them behind...<br>After a special Jumpy Dumpty hits a Krash-Kaboom Mine, {{color|#f39000|a large AoE cross-shaped explosion}} will be triggered. That should teach the Spikey Fish a good lesson!
|-
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Spikey Sneaky Seagrass.png|100px]]
|Spikey Sneaky Seagrass
|The seagrass used as hiding places by Spikey Fish, but it seems that the seagrass cannot conceal the rotund outlines of those fish... As fragile as it might look, the seagrass can {{color|BP|block 1}} explosion from special Jumpy Dumpties. When the seagrass is placed in a line, trouble is sure to ensue...
|-
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Spikey Stony Stronghold.png|100px]]
|Spikey Stony Stronghold
|A solid fortification built by Spikey Fish using stones. It looks like nothing special, but its lower part seems to be rooted deep underground, thus making the Stronghold strong enough to {{color|BP|block}} the impact of a Jumpy Dumpty's explosion...<br>To defeat the Spikey Fish hiding behind, you'll need to find particular angles to bypass the obstruction of such fortifications.
|}

;Your Companions
{|class="article-table"
!colspan="2"|Name
!Description
!AoE
|-
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Mint Jelly Jumpy Dumpty.png|100px]]
|Mint Jelly Jumpy Dumpty
|A special Jumpy Dumpty that resembles Mint Jelly! Whenever the Spark Knight and Dodoco go out on adventures on hot days, they eat some Mint Jelly chilled by Mist Flowers, which is super refreshing in a hot summer!<br>The explosion AoE is in the shape of a mint leaf &mdash; {{color|BP|a thin cross}}!
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Mint Jelly Jumpy Dumpty AoE.png|100px]]
|-
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Caramel Cookie Jumpy Dumpty.png|100px]]
|Caramel Cookie Jumpy Dumpty
|A special Jumpy Dumpty that bares a similar color to that of caramel biscuits! When Spark Knight and Dodoco go out to play all day, caramel biscuits are a good choice for snacks because it's sweet, crunchy, and filling. They're great snacks!<br>The explosion AoE is like a spread-out picnic tablecloth, which is {{color|BP|nine grids in a square}}!
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Caramel Cookie Jumpy Dumpty AoE.png|100px]]
|-
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Berry Cake Jumpy Dumpty.png|100px]]
|Berry Cake Jumpy Dumpty
|A special Jumpy Dumpty whose color reminds you of berry cakes! The Spark Knight and Dodoco are learning to make this super-duper dessert. With the combination of cream and jam, every single bite is satisfaction enough for the taste buds!<br>The explosion AoE is just like the one during the cake battle &mdash; {{color|BP|a big big cross}}! However, Spark Knight and Dodoco never waste any food, not to mention any sweet, sweet dessert!
|[[File:Dodoco's Bomb-Tastic Adventure Berry Cake Jumpy Dumpty AoE.png|100px]]
|}
